subject: Re: [R] Help Installing R
body:
On Fri, 2007-05-04 at 10:06 -0500, Pramod Anugu wrote:
> I have  unzipped the R-2.5.0.tar.gz
> gzip -dc R-x.y.z.tar.gz | tar xvf -
> 2. then #./configure

> configure: error: --with-readline=yes (default) and headers/libs are not
> available
>  
> I get the error above
>  
> 
> 4. make
> 
> make: *** No targets specified and no makefile found.  Stop
> 
>  
> 
> Please let me the solution to the installation problem.
> 
>  
> 
> Thanks

See this post from about 30 minutes ago:

https://stat.ethz.ch/pipermail/r-help/2007-May/131236.html

HTH,

Marc Schwartz

______________________________________________
R-help@stat.math.ethz.ch mailing list
https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-help
PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
